data.eml:eml: Systematic re-structure and new species of Sphaerodoridae (Annelida) after morphological revision and molecular phylogenetic analyses of the North East Atlantic fauna

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Capa, Maria, Nygren, Arne, Parapar, Julio, Bakken, Torkild, Meissner, Karin, Moreira, Juan (2019): Systematic re-structure and new species of Sphaerodoridae (Annelida) after morphological revision and molecular phylogenetic analyses of the North East Atlantic fauna. ZooKeys 845: 1-97, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.845.32428, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.845.32428
